subject: Hello dear,
body:
Hello dear,
It is understandable that you may be a bit apprehensive because you do not know me, I am writing this mail to you with tears in my eyes and deep sorrow in my heart, I decided to contact you due to the urgency of my situation.
My Name is SUSAN PASCAL, am contacting you from Burkina Faso. I want to tell you this because I don't have any other option than to tell you as I was touched to open up to you, I am married to Late Dr George Pascal who worked with French Embassy in Ouagadougou the capital city of Burkina Faso for nine years before he died in the year 2011. We have no child. When my husband was alive he deposited the sum of US$10,900,000.00(Ten Million Nine Hundred thousand United States Dollars) with a bank in overseas.
Presently this money is still in that bank over there. He made this money available for the exportation of Gold from Burkina mining. Recently, My Doctors told me that i have just a few months to live because they diagnised me a cancerous  health issue and partial  cerebrovascular complications. Having known my condition I decided to hand you over this mission to take care of the less-privileged, you will utilize this money the way I am going to instruct herein. I want you to take 25% of the total money for your personal use While 70% of the money will go to charity work" helping poor, building churches,mosques, orphange homes,hospitals etc and 5% for Nancy Kabore, the poor little girl who takes care of me in this hospital. She's a very kind  girl....very humaine.
Because I grew up as an Orphan and I don't have anybody as my family member, please endeavor to invest this funds in charity as i ve stated above . Am doing this so that God will forgive my sins and accept my soul because i know for sure that i won't survive this ailment. As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact of the bank.
Remain blessed
Yours Sister
Mrs. SUSAN PASCAL

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mrs. Susan Pascal,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I can understand how difficult this must be for you. It's kind of you to think of others in need during this challenging time.

I would like to know more about the charity work you mentioned. Could you please provide some details on the specific projects or organizations that the funds will be directed towards? Additionally, how do you plan on ensuring that the money is used for its intended purpose?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
My dear Thomas, 
I am so sorry to have bothered you with my personal problem, I also thank you for your understanding and kind response to my distress call. My God will certainly bless you.
Please note that I am so critically down ( health-wise)that I can't do much now. Even to write on these keyboards is such a herculean task for me. So please bear with me. 

I sincerely plead with you to open up communication immediately with the custodians of the funds so that they will release the funds to you for the charity work.I want you to invest the funds in setting up orphanage organizations/outfits for taking good care of genuine orphans and less privilaged in the society. 
As soon as I hear from you, I will give you their contact details. Please furnish me with your full names and address, mobile telephone number, your occupation and marital status so that I will tell the bank that I know fully well the person I have chosen as my next of kin and beneficiary to the funds.Waiting to hear from you. Sincerely yoursSuzanne Pascal.

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Dear Pascal,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your personal problem. I'm sorry to hear that you're facing difficulties, but I appreciate your trust in me. It's wonderful that you have such a noble intention of setting up orphanage outfits to help the less privileged in society.

I understand that it may be challenging for you to provide all the necessary details, but I would like to know more about the custodians of the funds. Could you please tell me how long they have been holding onto these funds? And what is their relationship with you?

Additionally, before I can proceed further, could you please clarify why they require my personal information such as full name, address, mobile telephone number, occupation, and marital status? I want to ensure that everything is legitimate and secure.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
My dear Thomas,My husband deposited the funds 2years before his demise (that's 2009). There's no special relationship between me and  the custodians of the funds except  the fact that  they know me as the widow of late Dr. George Pascal and the immenient beneficiary as his next of kin. They are aware of my predicament though.They also have a profesional right and responsibility to proect me from lossing the funds. So they will ask me some questions to ensure i havent fallen into the hands of criminals. This is why i have to know some basics about you, so that i will be fluent enough when proving to them that i know you too well. It wasn't acually the custodians of the funds that asked about your personal data. NO!!! Its me that finds it imperative that i should know. Please may i know which type of details exactly you need about the custodians of the funds??    
Waiting to hear from you.Sincerely yours,Suzane.

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your response and I understand the importance of ensuring the safety of the funds. However, before I provide any personal details, could you please clarify who exactly the custodians of the funds are? Are they a financial institution or a legal entity? It would be helpful to know more about their background and how they are connected to your late husband's assets.

Thank you for understanding and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: TIME is of the essence NOW.
body:
My dear Thomas,Thanks for your cautious and very clever questions. Please note that the fund's custodian is a very legitimate entity which has branches in all the continents.They are connected to my late husband's assets because my husband went to them as a client and deposited such huge amount of money with them for safe-keep.I sincerely wish you can now tell me the basics about yourself so that i can introduce you to them. I can't tell them to release the funds to  a certain Mr. Thomas who will contact them. It doesn't even sound serious. You know.....I really want you to receive these funds before my demise, therefore "TIME" is of the essence "NOW".
yours worried Suzane.

subject: Re: TIME is of the essence NOW.
body:
Hello Suzane,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that you are concerned about the legitimacy of the fund's custodian. Can you please provide me with more information about this entity? What is their name and where are they located? It would be helpful to know more details about them.

Regarding myself, I am just an ordinary person who is interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please explain to me how my involvement would help in releasing the funds? I want to make sure I fully understand the process before moving forward.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Can we please make some progress NOW???
body:
My dear Thomas,The name of this entity is J.P. MORGAN. They are located in the United States of America.
My presence is required in their office for some vital endorsements before they could release the funds.I know theres certainly an alternative since they understand my current situation. However, the reason why your urgent involvement is paramount and inevitable is this;  if this funds gets to my account or custody today and i die the next day, the money is gone forever!!! Nancy is the only one i trust but she's only a child, she has no bank account either. Everybody here is a wolve in sheep's clothing, especially the bankers!, if they see such amount in an account and the owner dies, the money is gone for good. But if you are able to open up communication with the custodians of my funds now on my behalf and i affirm to them that they should deal directly with you, my spirit will be relaxed and rest assured that even at  my death, the funds will be in the right hands and will be utilized for the very purpose its meant. But for now, am seriously worried because everyday we keep on rigmarrowing the same topic, no progress made towards the release of the funds.The custodians of the funds have been waiting to hear from me since our last communication has been over 7 days now. You said you are just an ordinary person, listen my dear i dont need a super human for this task, all i need is a determined ordinary individual with human sympathy. God has always used ordinary persons to do extra-ordinary work....SO.....????
Suzane.

subject: Re: Can we please make some progress NOW???
body:
Hello Suzane,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that you are in a difficult situation and need assistance with some funds. Can you please provide me with more details about the nature of this transaction? How did you come across this opportunity?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Who is this please and whats this confusion about???
body:
What exactly are you talking about???? Which opportunity???? assistance with some funds???Am i really still talking to Thomas? Or has your email account been hacked?
Suzane.

subject: Re: Who is this please and whats this confusion about???
body:
Hello Suzane,

I apologize if my previous message was unclear. I'm actually reaching out to share some exciting information about a new opportunity that has come my way. It's not related to any assistance or hacking of email accounts, so no need to worry about that.

You see, I recently came across a program called "Thomas' Success System" that claims to help people achieve financial freedom and success in their lives. I've been doing some research on it and it seems quite promising. Have you heard of it before?

I'm really interested in learning more about this program and how it works. Do you have any experience with it or know anyone who has tried it? I'd love to hear your thoughts and insights.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Who is this please and whats this confusion about???
body: So finally you dont want to contact JP MORGAN ?????

subject: Re: Who is this please and whats this confusion about???
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm always open to hearing about new opportunities and information. What can you tell me about JP Morgan?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Pls am sick, if you want to help me do, i need NO money from you pls
body:
I dont know what you mean by new oppotunities because i have NO new opportunities for you. All i have been begging you for the past 2 weeks is just to contact JP MORGAN CHASE BANK as the new beneficiary of the 10.9 M usd deposited by my late husband before his demise.  This is the only one thing i have been asking of you, and you kept on turning up and down with irrelevant questions and talks.
Suzane.N/B.....I know you are very poor guy, so please understand you have absolutely nothing to loose in this.

subject: Re: Pls am sick, if you want to help me do, i need NO money from you pls
body:
Hello there! I apologize if there has been any confusion or misunderstanding. Could you please provide me with more details about the situation? I want to make sure I understand what you're asking for regarding contacting JP Morgan Chase Bank.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Pls am sick, if you want to help me do, i need NO money from you pls
body: Mr. Thomas, a whooping sum of TEN MILLION  NINE HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS (10.900.000.00 ) is about to be instructed into your care. Is it too much for to request knowing youI mean you must have to give me basic details about yourself which will be conspicious in  my letter to JP MORGAN. So that when you write them too, the details will tally.The only thing i know about you is MR, THOMAS....which makes absolutly no sense because there are over    100 billion  Mr.Thomases in this world today.

subject: Re: Pls am sick, if you want to help me do, i need NO money from you pls
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, the amount you mentioned is quite impressive. However, before I proceed, could you please provide me with more information about this opportunity? I would like to understand how it all works and what my role would be in handling such a large sum of money.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Its very simple.
body:
Your role is to receive this funds from JP MORGAN CHASE BANK  and use the funds to establish very standard orphanages and centres for helping the less priviledged in our society. Thats all.Suzane.N/B: do you realise that  if i die now, all these your exam questions and answers will  be zero because  JPMORGAN  will never release the funds  to you because they dont know you and i cant introduce a total stranger to them, asking them to give him  my husbands fortune and when they ask me who you are, i will say he  IS MR THOMAS.....From WHERE???? i don't know!!!. phone number, i don't know!!!!If you qre the bank, in this scenerio please be honest will you  consider me  as a serious individual  let alone releasing such amount  of money to you????
Suzane.

subject: Re: Its very simple.
body:
Hello Suzane, thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like you have a noble cause in mind to help the less fortunate in our society. Can you tell me more about how you came across this opportunity to receive funds from JP MORGAN CHASE BANK for establishing orphanages and centers? How do you plan to ensure transparency and accountability in using these funds for such a meaningful purpose?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body: I' ve seen that you dont understand the english language which i have been speaking to you for the past 2 weeks. I think theres no need for me to continue wasting my limited energy on you unless maybe you understand french, then i can explain to you in french. Otherwise i discovered that the only english you know is THANK YOU FOR REACHING OUT TO ME....."

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body:
Hello! I appreciate your message. I do understand English well, so feel free to continue sharing with me in this language. What did you want to explain to me in French?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body: what i want to explain in french is the same thing i have been explaning to you for the past 2 weeks and you refuse to understand or PRETEND NOT to understand.

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body:
Hello! I understand that you've been trying to explain something to me in French for the past few weeks. Can you please remind me what it is that you're trying to convey?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body: Nothing much....just trying to let you understand that iwu ezigbo idiot

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body:
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling frustrated. Can you please provide more information so I can better understand the situation?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body: Which situation are you talking about Sir? Could you please explain to me Sir?.  Its obvious you are rather the frustrated one here because your poverty has greatly affected your brains.

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body:
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you think I'm frustrated. Can you please tell me more about the situation you're referring to? I'd like to understand better.

subject: Re: theres no need to waste my time and energy on you
body:
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling frustrated. Can you please share more details about the situation you're referring to? I'd like to understand better.

subject: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE here. I can not be frustrated. Cant you see how frustrated you are because you are so wretched as a broken ass??

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body:
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you're feeling frustrated. Is there anything specific that's bothering you right now? Let's talk about it.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body: Nothing is bothering me. I have nothing to talk with you since you dont even know the reason why i contacted you. Theres no point wasting my precious time with you because its obvious you are a robot or any other product of artificial inteligence

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body: Or even a mad person

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body:

Best wishes,

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body:
Hello! I'm here to help. What made you reach out to me? Let's see if we can figure out how I can assist you.

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body: So long as you dont have a NAME, PHONE NUMBER and ADDRESS, i have NOTHING to discuss with you.

subject: Re: I said you are the FRUSTRATED ONE
body:
Hello! I completely understand your concern about privacy. Is there any other way I can assist you or provide information that doesn't involve sharing personal details? Feel free to ask any questions you may have.

Best wishes,

subject: i understand
body: OFCOURSE YOU CANT GIVE WHAT YOU DONT HAVE, I CLEARLY UNDERSTAND YOU ON THAT. So zuzu away from my mail, ok?
